data.comment: The match has started.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a Monterrey throw-in in Pachuca's half.
In the minute 3, In Pachuca de Soto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick Monterrey.
Pachuca have a goal kick.
In the minute 6, Pachuca's Victor Guzman gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
Romario Ibarra of Pachuca gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 7, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards Monterrey a goal kick.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
Goal! Sebastian Vegas gives Monterrey a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 8, Great play from Maximiliano Meza to set up the goal.
Monterrey awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Pachuca push forward at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo and Rodrigo Salinas Dorantes gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Monterrey defence.
In the minute 13, Can Pachuca capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Monterrey's half?
Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
Victor Davila for Pachuca gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 14, It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
Corner awarded to Monterrey.
Pachuca have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
Monterrey's Rogelio Funes Mori is whistled for offside at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 22, Goal kick for Monterrey at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Monterrey drive forward but Ake Arnaud Loba is judged offside.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Victor Davila gets his shot on target but fails to score for Pachuca.
Free kick for Monterrey in the half of Pachuca.
In the minute 26, Monterrey are coming forward and Miguel Layun gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 28, Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
Monterrey have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of Monterrey.
In the minute 31, Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
Pachuca are pushing forward but Victor Davila's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 33, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards Monterrey a goal kick.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Pachuca.
Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Can Monterrey get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
Monterrey to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Monterrey in Pachuca de Soto.
In the minute 37, Ball safe as Pachuca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 42, Ake Arnaud Loba is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Leonardo Ramos for Pachuca who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 45, Free kick Pachuca.
Leonardo Ramos returns to the field for Pachuca after picking up a slight injury.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
He's off! Ake Arnaud Loba is shown a red card.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Pachuca make their first substitution with Victor Sosa replacing Erick Sanchez.
In the minute 47, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Monterrey at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Monterrey have a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Monterrey to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
The away team have replaced Stefan Medina with Jesus Gallardo. This is the first substitution made today by Antonio Mohamed.
Pachuca's Victor Davila misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 55, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards Monterrey a goal kick.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a Monterrey throw-in in Pachuca's half.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a throw-in for Monterrey, close to Pachuca's area.
In the minute 58, It's a goal kick for the home team in Pachuca de Soto.
Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Monterrey.
In the minute 59, Luis Chavez (Pachuca) has received a yellow card from Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
Pachuca's Victor Davila breaks free at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 61, Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
Goal kick for Monterrey at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
In the minute 65, Paulo Pezzolano is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo with Roberto de la Rosa replacing Leonardo Ramos.
Paulo Pezzolano (Pachuca) is making a third substitution, with Felipe Pardo replacing Luis Chavez.
Pachuca needs to be cautious. Monterrey have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 66, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
Throw-in for Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 68, Daniel Alexis Parra is replacing Maximiliano Meza for Monterrey at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards Monterrey a goal kick.
The away team have replaced Matias Kranevitter with Celso Ortiz. This is the third substitution made today by Antonio Mohamed.
In the minute 70, In Pachuca de Soto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Pachuca de Soto to check on Daniel Alexis Parra, who is grimacing with pain.
Rodrigo Salinas Dorantes (Pachuca) sees red and is sent off in Pachuca de Soto!
In the minute 73, Daniel Alexis Parra for Monterrey is back on the field again.
Pachuca have a goal kick.
Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Monterrey.
In the minute 76, Efrain Orona is on a sub for Romario Ibarra for Pachuca.
Can Pachuca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monterrey's half?
In Pachuca de Soto Pachuca attack through Victor Davila. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 80, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards Monterrey a goal kick.
Throw-in Pachuca.
Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of Monterrey.
In the minute 82, Eric Cantu is replacing Miguel Layun for the away team.
Jonathan Gonzalez is replacing Carlos Rodriguez for Monterrey at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 84, Monterrey to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
Victor Sosa levels the score at 1-1.
Monterrey's Daniel Alexis Parra gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 87, Pachuca are pushing forward but Victor Sosa's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Monterrey at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of Monterrey.
In the minute 88, Corner awarded to Pachuca.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
In Pachuca de Soto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
Free kick Monterrey.
Monterrey have a goal kick.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Free kick for Monterrey in the half of Pachuca.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
Can Pachuca capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Pachuca's Efrain Orona gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 1-1.
Felipe Pardo for Pachuca has been booked by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre and receives a first yellow card.
Eric Cantu (Monterrey) has received a first yellow card.
